评论详情: It's beautiful and perfect for my Stevie Nicks costume :) good quality and shipped right away !
I like it, just stinks that the fringe got really dirty during shipping. I wasn’t able to get it all out. But it’s more like a light gray. Sooo oh well.
Was like a rectangle lace tablecloth that arm holes were cutout of. Just didn’t fit/lay the way I desired. Returned.

So this is a nice piece of lace like material with a pretty fringe.  The problem is the shape. It's pretty much a rectangle with 2 long armhole slits. It's not made like a vest. That's why it lays funny in the front. The fringe goes all along the edge on the bottom ,great, but the 2 edges ,the short sides of this rectangle do not have fringe, so this bunch up occurs at the front . If fringe was on the short sides I think it would help the over all look. If it had some shaping like a vest it would help. The way it lays reminds me of the "lace" tablecloths u buy in the dime store. It's stiff so it piles up like a fan I guess. It's just so weird shaped. I was hoping to layer it for a Stevie Nicks kinda vibe,but it not quite happening. The lace pattern is gorgeous. I think I will try and cut the front or run some stitches to give it some shape .it looks great from the back and I don't mind the irregular hemline. I just really wish they had run the fringe on the short sides. Price was low ,about 22 bucks,so I guess it's not a bad deal if u can modify it. Hoping for the best .
If it’s really weird around the shoulders. After I bought it and tried it on, I was reading the reviews and notice other people said the same thing it’s just something about the cut that is strange.
Love it !!
I purchased this to wear over my bathing suit in the summer time. It’s really pretty and adds a little flare.
Looks better in ad than in person. The back is shorter than the front by a lot and it just doesn’t seem worth the money spent.
A piece of lace with holes for arms. Not worth it. It hangs weird. It's too thin. I sent it back

Very nice I wore it with jeans and a rock and roll t-shirt just what I want it if you like that Stevie Nick rock and roll look it's for you. Well worth the price, nice accessory to wear over any t-shirt or blouse. I do recommend this product.
This is a well-made vest.  I like everything about it.  Fits perfectly and came when it was expected.  I would purchase from this seller again.
Super thin just looked like torn fabric . Returned  there was no weight or quality to this at all
I’m a 3-4x and this fits awesome on me! Even a little big. Worth it.
I love this cardigan but i had to trim a couple of ends off because it's not all one length and a couple strands would touch the ground while walking.
Love the quality and hand stiching
Super cute, but couldn’t get over how delicate it felt.

评论概述: Super cool for the Stevie Nicks concert!
评论详情: Wore this over my Stevie Nicks shirt to her concert a couple weeks ago. Got compliments on it. It's super fun and lightweight. I'm only 5'4 and The Fringe almost hit the ground but that was okay with me. Decent price too!

评论概述: The cardigan is a one size fit all; too big at 5’4  130 lbs, I will return it.
评论详情: Light and airy; beautiful cardigan; one size fit all. Returning it bc it is too large on a 5’4, 130 lbs. Read the reviews before you order.

I am 5"7', 195 lbs and fit great! super cute. Just be careful washing it. I came out of the dryer completely tangled in several other items. I was able to untangle it but i took some time, I suggest dip/hand washing this, its a coverall so that should be easy to not get too dirty.
It is for Mother’s Day

评论概述: Frayed on edges when received, unraveled by third wear.
评论详情: Lovely product, but the edges on the shoulders were slightly frayed upon arrival.  I needed it for an outfit the next day, so didn't return.  By the third wear, half of the shoulder had unraveled.  Very unpleased.

This vest is made out of inexpensive, but pretty lace; the kind that is flat. It didn't really fit me. I'm 5'5", 112 lbs. When l got the shoulders in place, it wouldn't close in the front. However, the back has four, beautiful curved sections at the bottom, along with delicate see through fringe with tiny dark spots on each piece.  The front edging is pretty too. So, if, like me, you see things for their parts and potential, you might be delighted with it. I will probably cut it apart and add it to other things. So I'm happy, actually.

I like it flows and fits well… i have not worn it a lot, but I’m hoping it hold up because it feels thin. I should have given a higher review, but The color I got is a very crisp white and I wish it was a slightly off like ivory color.
I'm excited for warmer weather. It's made very well.
Cheap material
Giving outfit a style, really nice style. Very gentle as to not snag or get caught.
The cut is not what I expected.  All of the fringe is in the back, none in the front.The lace is very pretty.  I will still wear it but just not what I thought it would be.
quality material
This was longer than I expected but so pretty and got a lot of compliments

I loved this lacey vest! I feel so elegant wearing it. It's long, dramatic, it draws attention to other parts of you, rather than the parts you're not crazy about.  It can be worn out to dinner, for any holiday, and with jeans also. The size is the kind of size that will fit a variety of ladies sizes.  My daughter is size 10 and I'm an 18 - we both fit in this, just in different ways,  so feel free to try this out no matter what size you are. I know you will love it!
It's too long! I'm 5'3 and it drags on the ground at least 5 or 6 inches on the fringe drangsi could cut it off but them the fringe will fray

As others have stated, the back pattern is not aligned/centered correctly.  The arm holes have a very weird cut therefore causing it to sit crazy on the shoulders and bunching up around the neck instead of laying flat.  Other then that it's ok and I'll keep it but don't expect to wear it often.  Side note: if you work a desk job beware, the long side fridges will get caught around the wheels of your chair.

Fits well, but did not receive one as pictured.  I have the white one and love it so ordered one in black.  Totally different design.
You will not regret this purchase. I wear it several times a week.

The lace is higher quality than I was expecting for the price! The armpits are a little weird. It fits more like a long vest than a robe... Which makes the sizing is slightly off... But it's intended as one size fits all and you get what you pay for!  Overall, I like the best robe quite a bit. I would prefer more of a robe fit than a vest fit... But it's much better than I was expecting for being so cheap. I got it in black and would maybe recommend a different color because I often wear black pants and black on black isn't necessarily great. But that's a me problem!
Bought this to wear over a dress.  It’s so cute and chic.  I’m 5’10” and 270 pounds and it fit perfect.

评论概述: Very cute - much better than I expected!

The fabric is a bit scratchy, but that's not a huge issue since you'll be wearing it over other layers. It has a loose-ish fit, which gives it a nice bohemian aesthetic. 评论概述: Design very off center in back
评论详情: I like things that are a good pattern and symmetrical.  On the website it shows the pattern very centered in the back, with the V shape right in the middle, (at the bottom just before the fringes start.  When I received mine, the design didn't look anything like the online photo, and the design was off at least 2-3 inches to one side.  It makes it look cheap and haphazardly put together.  I contacted the seller to tell this, and asked if they had one as described and shown in the photo, and they replied that they did not have one.  I like the fabric and style in general, plus the overall lace pattern is larger and bolder in some areas.  But the back side should NOT look like this.  I am disappointed since I liked other aspects.  I have to return it since I would not wear it looking like it does.
I am a true 3x and this still fit over a shirt or maxi dress great. It elevated the look. Super cute.
Was very cute. Planned on wearing with a tank top, shorts, and boots to the stockyards, but event cancelled. Was flowy and not tight. I'm an 18/20 and a 2 at Torrid, so fit well.
